Fri & Sat ~ 11:30am to 12:00am
(Late Night Menu Served Sat 10:00 pm to 12:00 am)
Sun ~ 11:30Am to 10:00pm
/$
/$
$
About
$
YOUR NEIGHBORHOOD
INSTITUTION
/$
$
Are you looking for a local neighborhood Tavern with fantastic food and the friendliest of staffs? Carsons Tavern is your place! This cozy, dark-wood restaurant bar features a well-balanced menu with daily specials; weekly live music performed by a varied array of talented eclectic musicians and a choice of well crafted drinks and fresh draft beers served up cold by the areas most efficient bartenders. And don't forget the 7 large flat screen TV's to enjoy your favorite sporting event with friends. Come join us for happy times at Carsons Tavern
/$
$
/$
/$
$
News
$
/$
$
CARSONS KITCHEN
/$
$
Initially a friendly pub with high quality food, Carsons Tavern has evolved into a fine restaurant. We cater to all demographics. From the patron who desires the best wings in town and ice cold draft beer to enjoy while watching the ballgame to the couple coming to dine and enjoy our delicious fresh fish or New York Strip coupled with a bottle of wine, the Tavern is your desired destination
We feature daily specials at lunch & dinner. Some special dishes you may want to visit us for include our famous French Dip on Tuesday and Friday lunch and Prime Rib 8 or 12 oz cut featured on Saturday night.
/$
$
Stuart Magazine 2019 Best of the Region Awards
Best Burgers / Hang-Out for Singles
​
Quality meats and produce are the standards at Carsons Tavern, resulting in a divine burger selection including classics like the Black-and-Blue Burger and a Barbecue Bourbon Burger. Not just a great place for meat, it’s also a great place to meet. In addition to Best Burger, Carsons won in the Best Hangout for singles category. That’s because its live music and expansive bar sets the perfect scene for mingling
/$
Music
$
MUSIC & EVENTS
/$
$
A wide variety of fantastic live music is performed regularly at Carsons Tavern from solo acoustic to full bands. Please check our music calendar. Also don't forget that every Tuesday from 5:00 to 9:00pm John Lang is the feature act headlining our Irish Night.
Carsons Tavern is active in the community hosting 2 large charitable events annually, the Diamond Dash 5k Run and The Robert F. Novins Memorial Golf Tournament. Other charitable causes have found a home here at the Tavern, enjoying our dining room and breezeway area with food and drink. Call to inquire with management if you wish to host an event.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
